name: Redcolor2
body:
### RedColor firefox extension
This Firefox extension shows the current status as showed by PikudHahoref as a desktop notification. This extension works similar to the Chrome one (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/%D7%94%D7%AA%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%95%D7%AA-%D7%A4%D7%99%D7%A7%D7%95%D7%93-%D7%94%D7%A2%D7%95%D7%A8%D7%A3/lfljmnpcnpfdeadcnbejaoihhhflfmdm?hl=he)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
